pakisthana aarakshaka niyojitha kandayama shri lankawe rajya aarakshaka ha nagarika sanwardhana amathyanshaye lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha, widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye lekam kshenuka senewirathna, aarakshaka mandalika pradhani janaral jagath jayasuriya mahathma mahathminda thriwidha hamudapathiwarun menma maha banku niyojithayanda hamuwi sakachcha kirimata niyamitha bawa shri lankawe pakisthana maha komasaris karyalaya kiyayi.
rate aarthikaya kada watima, sanwardhanaye mandagami bawa, rajaye prathipaththi kriyathmaka nokirima yanadiya gana rajaya nokarana kandayama katha kala.
oya kramaya sahena durata hpandayi.
tenisan mamage diwa patalenna wachana kriyathmaka wena widiha awul bawa hitha danna nisada danne na.
shri lankawe pradhanathama waraya wage ma dakunu aasiyawe wishalathama waraya wana kolambaa waraya lokaye karyabahula ma warayayan athara 25 wana sthanaye thibenawa..
